segments.text: It has stopped snowing , but it's even colder .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Look at the ice there hanging from the eaves .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And the streets are covered with snow .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you know what the temperature is today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I missed today's weather forecast over the TV .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It feels like ten degrees below zero at least . I don't mind the cold weather but I do hate it when it gets slippery .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The ice will soon be thick enough for skating . I am so fond of winter sports .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's great . Let's go skating together tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S1
